pr_title: Add fast JNI support for JDK9 Unsafe

timeline.bodyText: Given this and the J9_FAST_JNI_METHOD_TABLE(sun_misc_Unsafe) table are identical now, we don't need to create the second copy.   The sun_misc_Unsafe table can be assigned to the J9_FAST_JNI_CLASS("jdk/internal/misc/Unsafe", jdk_internal_misc_Unsafe) class in FastJNI.cpp
timeline.author: DanHeidinga

replies.bodyText: Super - that is a great idea - let me update the PR
replies.author: andrewcraik

timeline.message:
Add fast JNI support for JDK9 Unsafe

In JDK9 and later the Unsafe class moved from sun.misc to jdk.internal.
This change adds support for this change in the package name.

Signed-off-by: Andrew Craik <ajcraik@ca.ibm.com>

Add fast JNI support for JDK9 Unsafe

In JDK9 and later the Unsafe class moved from sun.misc to jdk.internal.
This change adds support for this change in the package name.

Signed-off-by: Andrew Craik <ajcraik@ca.ibm.com>
